title: Loving Hut - Khan-uul
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Please send HappyCow the correct map location, thanks!
streetAddress: 2nd Floor, Mongol Nekhmel Co Ltd, 2nd Khoroo, Khan-uul district, Mongolia
